name: clip-recap-pipeline
description: Daily Twitch clips to blog recap pipeline using Cloudflare Workers

scripts.dev:info: echo 'Local dev runs on http://127.0.0.1:8787 by default (override with --port)' && echo 'Use .dev.vars for local secrets; production secrets are not auto-loaded (use --env <name> or --remote for edge testing)' && wrangler dev
scripts.test:all: npm run test:health && npm run test:twitch && npm run test && npm run test:pipeline && npm run test:deduplication && npm run test:audio && npm run test:transcription && npm run test:github-events && npm run test:content && npm run test:scoring && npm run test:job-management
scripts.test:local: echo '⚠️  Local tests require secrets not available in local dev' && echo 'To test locally:' && echo '  1. Start dev server: npm run dev (runs on http://127.0.0.1:8787)' && echo '  2. Set WORKER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8787' && echo '  3. Run: WORKER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8787 npm run test:all' && echo '  4. Or test against production: npm run test:all' && echo 'Note: Use .dev.vars file or --remote flag to access secrets'
